comments.body: License file is not included unfortunately. However the header says MIT. It looks like they are moving it to a [GitHub repo]( https://github.com/tronkko/dirent ). Though there is no release/tag and it is unclear how that relates to package on `softagalleria.net`. So for now went with the `softagalleria.net` package, but can switch over and package the license once those issues are addressed. Opened issue ( https://github.com/tronkko/dirent/issues/10 ) upstream to get the release situation addressed.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +26,30 @@  home: https://softagalleria.net/dirent.php
  license: MIT
  # No license file, unfortunately.
  summary: Dirent interface for Microsoft Visual Studio

comments.body: Other maintainers welcome. :) Simply a header file so should be easy.
